title: Variety of designs
description: Use samples as-is or with new blocks from a UI Kit

item.title: Easy to use
item.name: To get started, you select the desired sample and base the entire website on it. It’s that simple!

item.title: Variety of designs
item.name: Each of these beautiful samples you can use as-is or with new blocks from a UI Kit to make your startup.

item.title: User Guide
item.name: You’ll get a description of each component and learn how to connect and use them.

item.title: Responsive Layout
item.name: Of course we haven’t forgotten about the responsive layout. Create a website with full mobile support.
